document_data.mainbody:
The Medallion of Time was a piece of jewelry with the power to change the time frame of elements within the Mobius Tower.
The Medallion of Time was large, with an intrincate design.
The Medallion of Time had the power to change the time frame of any object to the wearers time frame up to three times a week. It was one of the only two ways that such a thing could be achieved in Mobius Tower.
The Medallion of Time was worn by the Guardian of Time inside Mobius Tower. Adventurers may have used it to remove the crystal minaret required by Marteks trials, but the Guardian would not have given it up without a fight.
*Guardian of Time
